STEP 2 Filing Status: Mark one box only.
1
Single: Were you claimed as a dependent on another person’s Iowa return?
YES
NO
2
Married filing a joint return. (Two-income families may benefit by using status 3 or 4.)
3
Married filing separately on this combined return. Spouse use column B.
4
Married filing separate returns.     Spouse’s name:

STEP 12
I (We), the undersigned, declare under penalty of perjury that I (we) have examined this return, including all accompanying schedules
and statements, and, to the best of my (our) knowledge and belief, it is a true, correct, and complete return. Declaration of preparer
(other than taxpayer) is based on all information of which the preparer has any knowledge.
Your Signature                                                       Date            Check if Deceased   Date of  Death

amount of tax you owe or decrease your refund.
